    [Bundler] Webpack Static, Module, SCSS

    2 ë¶„ ì†Œìš”

    ëª©ì°¨

    • 1. ì •ì  íŒŒì¼ ì—°ê²°
    • 2. Module
    • 3. SCSS

    1. ì •ì  íŒŒì¼ ì—°ê²°

    https://www.icoconverter.com/ì—ì„œ ì›í•˜ëŠ” ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ë³€ê²½

    • ì›ë³¸ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ì™€ ë³€í™˜ëœ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ í´ë” ë£¨íŠ¸ ê²½ë¡œì— ë³µì‚¬
    • static í´ë”ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  favicon.icoì™€ ì›ë³¸ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ì´ í´ë”ì— ë„£ì–´ì¤Œ
    • static í´ë” ì•ˆì— images í´ë”ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  ì›ë³¸ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ ì´ í´ë”ì— ë„£ì–´ì¤Œ



    <!-- index.html -->

<body>
  <h1>Hello Webpack!!</h1>
  <img src="./images/bear.jpg" alt="Bear">
</body>



    # terminal

$ npm i -D copy-webpack-plugin



    // webpack.config.js

const path = require('path')
const HtmlPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin')
const CopyPlugin = require('copy-webpack-plugin')

module.exports = {
  entry: './js/main.js',
  output: {
    clean: true
  },
  plugins: [
    new HtmlPlugin({
      template: './index.html'
    }),
    // static í´ë” ì•ˆì˜ ë‚´ìš©ì´ copyë˜ì–´ distí´ë”ë¡œ ë“¤ì–´ê°€ëŠ” plugin
    new CopyPlugin({
      patterns: [
        { from: 'static' }
      ]
    })
  ],
  devServer: {
    host: 'localhost'
  }
}



    # terminal

$ npm run dev


    2. Module

    static í´ë” ì•ˆì— css í´ë” ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  main.css íŒŒì¼ ìƒì„±

    /* static/css/main.css */

body {
  background-color: orange;
}



    <!-- index.html -->

<head>
  <title>Hello Webpack!</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/reset-css@5.0.1/reset.min.css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="./css/main.css">
</head>



    # terminal

$ npm run dev


    ë£¨íŠ¸ ê²½ë¡œì— css í´ë” ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  main.css íŒŒì¼ ìƒì„±

    /* css/main.css */

body {
  background-color: orange;
}



    // js/main.js

import '../css/main.css'

console.log('Webpack!')


    CSS íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€ ì„¤ì¹˜

    # terminal

$ npm i -D css-loader style-loader



    // webpack.config.js

const path = require('path')
const HtmlPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin')
const CopyPlugin = require('copy-webpack-plugin')

module.exports = {
  entry: './js/main.js',
  output: {
    clean: true
  },
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,  // .cssë¡œ ëë‚˜ëŠ” íŒŒì¼
        use: [  // ìˆœì„œ ì¤‘ìš”!!
          'style-loader',  // HTMLì˜ style íƒœê·¸ì— í•´ì„ëœ ë‚´ìš©ì„ ì‚½ì…í•˜ëŠ” ìš©ë„
          'css-loader'  // Javascriptì—ì„œ cssíŒŒì¼ì„ í•´ì„í•˜ëŠ” ìš©ë„
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new HtmlPlugin({
      template: './index.html'
    }),
    new CopyPlugin({
      patterns: [
        { from: 'static' }
      ]
    })
  ],
  devServer: {
    host: 'localhost'
  }
}



    # terminal

$ npm run dev


    3. SCSS

    ë£¨íŠ¸ ê²½ë¡œì— scss í´ë” ìƒì„±í•˜ê³  main.scss íŒŒì¼ ìƒì„±

    # terminal

$ npm i -D sass-loader sass



    /* scss/main.css */

$color--black: #000;
$color--white: #fff;

body {
  background-color: $color--black;
  h1 {
    color: $color--white;
    font-size: 50px;
  }
}



    // js/main.js

import '../scss/main.scss'

console.log('Webpack!')



    // webpack.config.js

const path = require('path')
const HtmlPlugin = require('html-webpack-plugin')
const CopyPlugin = require('copy-webpack-plugin')

module.exports = {
  entry: './js/main.js',
  output: {
    clean: true
  },
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.s?css$/,  // .scss or .cssë¡œ ëë‚˜ëŠ” íŒŒì¼
        use: [
          'style-loader',
          'css-loader',
          'sass-loader'  // Webpackì—ì„œ scssíŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì–´ë‚´ëŠ” ìš©ë„
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new HtmlPlugin({
      template: './index.html'
    }),
    new CopyPlugin({
      patterns: [
        { from: 'static' }
      ]
    })
  ],
  devServer: {
    host: 'localhost'
  }
}



    # terminal

$ npm run dev
